metadata_description: Development of a responsive Website for your business

promo.title: Development of a responsive Website for your business

get_know_me.title: Let’s get know about me closer
get_know_me.text: I will help you save time and money on developing a website for your business.  The portfolio presents a wide range of works.

testimonial.title: Testimonials
testimonial.desc: “Alexey was fantastic to work with from start to finish. We were looking for an outstanding site and it delivered. I tried to develop a website myself, thinking that I would not have to pay money to professional developers, but I was very mistaken. Working with Alexey was worth every penny and was surprisingly affordable! I can't thank Alexey enough for his efforts and professionalism. I would recommend him to anyone looking for a site!”
testimonial.name: Mike Davis

about.title: My goal is to complete the job to your satisfaction.

html-academy.frontend: Preparation for the profession, HTML and CSS. Professional website layout, HTML and CSS. Adaptive layout and automation, JavaScript. Professional development of web interfaces, Preparation of layout for content management systems (CMS), Layout of React components, Grading
html-academy.scoring: Skills are assessed in the format of completing test tasks with automatic checks. The tasks used were tasks of easy and medium difficulty level of the Olympiad on frontend for Yandex.

rs-school.frontend: Throughout the training, mock interviews are conducted with different mentors. The program consists of 3 stages. There may be requirements for advancing to each higher stage. Stage 1 - Git HTML CSS Javascript basics, Stage 2 - Advanced Javascript, Security, Testing, Agile, Networking, web development tools, Stage 3 - Collaborative development of a final project.
rs-school.react: RS School students who have completed RS School Stage #2 and new students with strong CoreJS/TS/Frontend skills: JavaScript TypeScript Git, GitHub (clone, add, commit, push, pull, merge, rebase, working with Pull Request) NPM, Webpack CSS3 / HTML5 Chrome DevTools, Figma Understanding of the REST
